tool_description: Automating tool for help you generate image from your website, blog or social media post.
name: IMG Foundry
title: IMG Foundry

api_list.name: Generate Image
api_list.description: generate image from url either retriving image directly or storing image for hotlink.

optional_parameters.name: owner_h2
optional_parameters.description: *[Pro Only]* override owner second lines text.

optional_parameters.name: owner_h1
optional_parameters.description: *[Pro Only]* override owner first lines text.

optional_parameters.name: bg_color
optional_parameters.description: *[Pro Only]* override background color in format *#RRGGBB*

optional_parameters.name: width
optional_parameters.description: override default width of image with the provided one.

optional_parameters.name: height
optional_parameters.description: override default height of image with the provided one.

optional_parameters.name: theme
optional_parameters.description: override default theme with *light* or *dark* options, default is *light*

optional_parameters.name: store
optional_parameters.description:
**true** : endpoint will response image id for later use
**false** : endpoint will response as image
Default : true
